text: Xianzhi a! Ni dang guli xinshimen fenyong zhandou. Jiaru nimen zhong you ershi ge jianren zhe [zhu], tamen jiang neng zhansheng erbai ren; jiaru nimen zhong you yibai ge jianren zhe, tamen jiang neng zhansheng yiqian ge bu xinyang zhe, yinwei tamen [bu xinyang zhe] que shi meiyou zhihui de minzhong.
